summary: I am a dedicated Human Resource/ Administration and Finance professional with 24 years International experience in various industries.  I possess soft and technical skills, knowledge, and experience with a strong attention to detail.  I have strong people skills and can work autonomously, efficiently, and proactively with a good team spirit.  I have an excellent level of understanding of HR Compliance, the application of legal texts as well as being resourceful and focused on delivering exceptional customer service while maintaining the confidentiality and discretion that is required.  I have been successful at helping new employees to adjust to the company culture and at the same time feel valued in their new roles.  I am highly driven at bringing an innovative approach to every discipline, while creating a team driven environment that fosters room for development and growth.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika
P.R. Pather Secondary School, Durban South Africa

profile_positions.description:
-Provide administrative assistance to the assigned vendors by the Clients HR Services Unit and assist in the general operation and maintenance quality.
-Main point of contact to the Project Management Team for all queries related to the consultants, regarding leave, pay queries and entitlements
-New employee onboarding (SAP POH)
-New employee profile creation (SAP POH)
-Verification of entitlements for salary and allowances (e.g. housing allowances, travel, medical)
-Verification of overtime and business expense claims
-Collect and analyse information relevant to the assigned Project Management Team (PMT) and intake on job descriptions
-Liase with the preferred vendors and customers (PMT’s and JV’s) with regards to filing requisitions.
-Ensure the proper maintenance and data input of HR SAP and Applicant tracking system (BrassRing).
-Update all systems to reflect the headcount
-Run monthly reports from different systems (SAP, PRC, POH, SAP SuccessFactors, e-services)
-Process and review manpower support invoices (SAP/POH) (approx. 400p/m) received from the vendors and ensure that they are compliant with the contract and guidelines
-Process Service Entries (SAP/PRC) on all invoices so that final payments can be made
-Maintain and create Purchase Orders in SAP such as PO extensions and closures
-Handle telephone calls and e-mails from the companies’ preferred suppliers with regards to queries on invoices, policy, contract, and recruitment related matters.
-Process incoming and outgoing e-mail and prioritise accordingly.
-Clear communication with Project Management Team in order to verify timesheets, requisitions, expenses, etc.
-Project Management Support to Saudi Arabia and United Kingdom
-Collect and analyse information relevant to the assigned PMT and intake on job descriptions
-Perform other miscellaneous duties as directed by the Group Leader.
profile_positions.title: HR Advisor

profile_positions.description:
•	Support the strategic vision of the faculty in promoting the principles of all-inclusive education throughout the school
•	Provide support and guidance for teachers in implementing innovative and modified programs and activities in the classroom, with specific focus on activities that assist the development of students with learning difficulties and disabilities.
•	Liase with other LES to provide appropriate information to aid appropriate transition planning and student intervention plans.
•	Develop termly reporting profiles
•	Work collaboratively with teachers to establish modified assessment tasks for students
•	Provide resources to support the learning needs of students with additional learning difficulties and their respective students
•	Support programs of remediation for individuals and groups within the School, e.g. Literacy and Numeracy development programs.
•	Work with students on a one to one or small group basis to provide relevant and appropriate literacy, numeracy and study skills assistance where appropriate.
•	Along with supporting students’ specific skills and knowledge base, spent time working with motivational and esteem issues with Students.
•	Conduct relevant testing for students experiencing literacy difficulties.
•	Develop and maintain strong links with parents of students requiring learning support.
•	Develop and maintain professional relationships with staff in order to provide appropriate and timely support
•	Participate in relevant and appropriate in-service programs, workshops and conferences with specific focus on learning difficulties and disabilities.
profile_positions.title: Learning Enrichment Support/ Administration

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop and facilitate all new-hire orientation
•	Conduct employee interview and recruitment 
•	Conduct employee verification and investigation
•	Contract preparation (limited duration and permanent staff members)
•	Main point of contact for approximately 250 staff members 
•	Responsible for all staff administration processes (Leave, sick leave, entitlements, overtime verification, housing allowances, travel reimbursements, business expense claims
•	Timekeeping and management in accordance with the Company rules and regulations
•	Termination procedures
•	Liaising with the Ministry of Interior with regards to the visa applications for International recruits
•	Developed company personnel policies, standard operating procedures and employee handbooks
•	Built a comprehensive employee recruitment strategy
•	Develop and enforced company disciplinary code
•	Develop and enforce company policy and procedures relating to all phases of human resource activity
•	Manage all aspects of leave administration, including employee notification and health benefits
•	Manage the employee offer process at the exempt level
•	Establish and monitor employee pay scales
•	Offer fair and equitable compensation by comparing current salaries with market pay
•	Conduct job analysis and job evaluation, resulting in quality job specification
•	Develop innovative new employee orientation program, including safety training.
•	Update key human resource metrics, including turnover and termination, using reporting tools on the HRMS database
•	Ad-hoc administrative tasks as required.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Processed unemployment claims and acted as the Company representative at unemployment hearings
•	Worked towards targets that may be related to the number of candidates placed, a value to be billed to clients or business leads generated
•	Develop and facilitate all new hire orientation
•	Conduct employee verification and investigation
•	Contract preparation (limited duration and permanent staff members)
•	Main point of contact for approximately 200 staff members
•	Responsible for all staff administration processes (leave, sick leave, entitlements, overtime verification, housing allowances, travel reimbursements, business expense claims)
•	Timekeeping and management in accordance with the Company rules and regulations.
•	Termination procedures
•	Used social media to advertise positions, attract candidates and build relationships with candidates and employers
•	Developed company personnel policies, standard operating procedures and employee handbooks
•	Built a comprehensive employee recruiting strategy
•	Enforced company policy and procedures relating to all phases of human resource activity
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Project Timekeeping and Management (SAP)
•	Project Administration
•	Compiled financial reports pertaining to cash receipts, expenditures and profit and loss.
•	Provided timely actual, forecasts and budget data for IT and corporate management
•	Received collection reports to determine the status of collections and the amounts of the outstanding balances 
•	Worked with management at the project level to ensure expense plans are achieved.
•	Worked with managers to develop annual expense goals
•	Maintained fixed asset module and calculate and record monthly depreciation expenses
•	Collected and reported monthly expense variances and explanations
•	Created presentation formats for monthly quarterly reviews of expense charge outs
•	Balanced monthly general ledger accounts to accurately record cost and month end accruals.
•	Invoice processing, purchase orders, expense reports, credit memos and payment transactions
•	Filed and addressed employee complaints in accordance with company policies and government regulations
•	Ad-hoc duties such as flight and hotel reservations for business travel
•	Reporting using SAP/R3
profile_positions.title: Projects Accounting Technician

profile_positions.description:
•	Oversaw daily office operations for staff and employees
•	Prepared and distributed payroll for staff and direct reports
•	Timekeeping and overtime management
•	Composed and drafted all outgoing correspondence and reports for managers
•	Oversaw inventory and office supply purchases
•	Compiled annual recommendations for end of fiscal year budgets
•	Negotiated pricing with vendors regarding wholesale billing and marketing procedures
•	Processed accounts receivable and accounts payable
•	Liase with vendors to order and maintain inventory of office supplies
•	Performed accounts receivable duties including invoicing, researching charge-backs, discrepancies and reconciliation
•	Reduced overheads by taking on more responsibility with creative and administrative projects
•	Managed the executive calendar and coordinated weekly project team meetings
•	Prepared meeting minutes and edited subcontractor proposals, project punch-lists, transmittals and memorandums for organizational support.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Executive
